knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)

Alignment matrices

```{r}
library(Biostrings)

data(BLOSUM45)
data(BLOSUM50)
data(BLOSUM62)
data(BLOSUM80)
data(BLOSUM100)
data(PAM30)
data(PAM40)
data(PAM70)
data(PAM120)
data(PAM250)

list(BLOSUM45 = BLOSUM45,
     BLOSUM50 = BLOSUM50,
     BLOSUM62 = BLOSUM62,
     BLOSUM80 = BLOSUM80,
     BLOSUM100 = BLOSUM100,
     PAM30 = PAM30,
     PAM40 = PAM40,
     PAM70 = PAM70,
     PAM120 = PAM120,
     PAM250 = PAM250) %>%
  lapply(function(x) reshape2::melt(x)) %>%
  rbindlist(idcol = "mat") %>%
  setnames(c("Var1", "Var2", "value"),
           c("aa.x", "aa.y", "score")) %>%
  fwrite("aln_matrices.txt", sep = "\t")
```
